code: import createPrefixer from'inline-style-prefixer/lib/createPrefixer';import staticData from"./static";var prefixAll=createPrefixer(staticData);export var prefixInlineStyles=function prefixInlineStyles(style){var prefixedStyles=prefixAll(style);Object.keys(prefixedStyles).forEach(function(prop){var value=prefixedStyles[prop];if(Array.isArray(value)){prefixedStyles[prop]=value[value.length-1];}});return prefixedStyles;};export default prefixAll;
